function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Urban marginalization and disease outbreaks","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid urban population growth and high-rise density","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequalities in access to sanitation and homelessness","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in managing high-rise-dense cities during pandemics","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proliferation of emergency measures during crisis","category":"Pandemic Response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk-literate urban citizenry leveraging crisis-information repositories for long-term impact","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate recognition of at-risk groups by local authorities increases the vulnerability of these populations to contagious diseases.","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation and job precarity leading to challenges","category":"Community","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of public acceptance of social distancing measures","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective implementation of multiple layers of social distancing","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to social distancing measures","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of community engagement in containment strategy","category":"Community","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scientific uncertainties about covid-19","category":"Pandemic Response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate public healthcare infrastructure in india to support herd immunity strategy","category":"Pandemic Response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient tracing of infection cases in india","category":"Pandemic Response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on mass testing as the primary strategy may lead to complacency in implementing other necessary measures such as social distancing and contact tracing.","category":"Pandemic Response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying solely on mass testing without proper training and resources for healthcare workers may result in inefficiency and errors in testing processes.","category":"Pandemic Response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The cost of widespread testing may limit access for certain populations, leading to disparities in healthcare and potential underreporting of cases.","category":"Pandemic Response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on herd immunity as a mitigation strategy for covid-19","category":"Pandemic Response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of covid-19 transmission in the built environment due to lack of mitigation measures and tools.","category":"Built Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of digital contact tracing applications without thorough regulatory process can lead to privacy violations and data security risks.","category":"Pandemic Response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of sars-cov-2 transmission in food industries due to lack of proper disinfection measures.","category":"Food Industry","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Employees in retail sectors are 5 times more likely to test positive for sars-cov-2 due to direct customer exposure.","category":"Retail Sector","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nurses experiencing extreme workload and mental health challenges due to covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on hospital management system financial expenses and documentation.","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Automobile sector sales plummeting and production delays due Economy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete coverage of past pandemics in the analysis","category":"Pandemic Response","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases data","category":"Transmission","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases propagation in the built environment","category":"Built Environment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic orders and curfews","category":"Pandemic Response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of violence against women due to pandemic
